prompt: What is the current temperature?
goal: allow the user to request the current temperature for their location

prompt: Describe the current weather.
goal: have the LLM construct a narrative weather description based on current conditions

prompt: How much rain fell at my location?
goal: allow the user to determine how much rain has accumulated at their location in the last 24 hours

prompt: Is it going to be sunny tomorrow?
goal: allow the user to determine cloud coverage for their location

prompt: Is rain expected at my location in the next 6 hours?
goal: allow the user to determine if precip will fall in the coming hours

prompt: What is the max forecasted temperature today?
goal: allow the user to determine how hot or cold the air temp will be

prompt: Will it be windy today?
goal: allow the user to determine the max wind speed for that day

prompt: How much rain fell at my location on date/time?
What dates did hail fall at my location during x time range?
goal: allow the user to request a list of dates at which hail fell at their location

prompt: Is it good weather to spray fertilizer?
How will the weather today impact solar panel performance?
Will my soccer game get rained out this evening?
goal: determine if rain will impact my location "this evening"

prompt: Is it safe to go hiking today based on the weather?
goal: check for high wind or rain forecast, perhaps extreme heat and cold

prompt: What is the liklihood of frost tonight?
goal: are forecast conditions right for frost

prompt: What time will be the hottest part of the day tomorrow?
goal: determine highest forecast heat index tomorrow

prompt: When is it forecasted to rain again at my house?
goal: use forecast precip rate or max reflectivity and/or accums to see if rain is forecasted in the next 3 days. If not, swap to GFS for days 4-14

prompt: How will the weather impact my flight today?
goal: check against conditions commonly associated with flight delays

prompt: Are there any flood warnings in my area?
goal: check against current watch/warning map

prompt: How will the weather affect road conditions and traffic safety tomorrow morning?
goal: check forecasted road conditions, perhaps check for heavy precip rate, high accums, snow depth

prompt: When was the last time it rained at my location?
goal: use historical rainfall, weather inspector?
